Borderline Brenner Tumor (BT)

🔬Background benign BT + thick transitional papillae (👀low-grade urothelial CA) +/- mucinous cells
📍If cytology= High-grade urothelial CA ➡️ Borderline BT w/ intraepi CA
📍If stromal invasion ➡️ Malignant BT
📍IHC:➕p63, GATA3

📌No/rare mitoses
